http.title: Default Web Site Page
http.html:
SORRY!
If you are the owner of this website, please contact your hosting provider: webmaster@67.227.195.11

It is possible you have reached this page because:

  • The IP address has changed.
    The IP address for this domain may have changed recently. Check your DNS settings to verify that the domain is set up correctly. It may take 8-24 hours for DNS changes to propagate. It may be possible to restore access to this site by following these instructions for clearing your dns cache.
  • There has been a server misconfiguration.
    You must verify that your hosting provider has the correct IP address configured for your Apache settings and DNS records. A restart of Apache may be required for new settings to take effect.
  • The site may have moved to a different server.
    The URL for this domain may have changed or the hosting provider may have moved the account to a different server.

<section class="av_textblock_section " itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/CreativeWork"><div class='avia_textblock  ' itemprop="text"><p>Muskegon is proud to have the largest beach in West Michigan. A city rich with history and strong sense of community that won us the Strongest Town Award in Michigan!</p>
<p>Our high level of services, recreational opportunities, and spectacular shoreline provide a high quality of life with the benefit of low costs of living – We are growing fast!</p>
<h2><strong><span style="color: #00ccff;">WATCH</span> <span style="color: #999999;">M</span><span style="color: #ff6600;">US</span><span style="color: #999999;">KE</span><span style="color: #99cc00;">GO</span><span style="color: #999999;">N</span></strong></h2>
<p>Muskegon City Hall<br/>
933 Terrace<br/>
Muskegon, MI 49440-1397<br/>
(231) 724-6705</p>
</div></section>

<section class="av_textblock_section " itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/CreativeWork"><div class='avia_textblock  ' itemprop="text"><h2 style="text-align: center;">What others say about us</h2>

<div data-autoplay='1' data-interval='5' data-animation='fade' data-hoverpause='1' class='avia-testimonial-wrapper avia-grid-testimonials avia-grid-2-testimonials avia_animate_when_almost_visible   '>
<section class='avia-testimonial-row'><div class='avia-testimonial av_one_half flex_column no_margin avia-testimonial-row-1 avia-first-testimonial' itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/Person"><div class='avia-testimonial_inner'><div class='avia-testimonial-image' itemprop="image" style='background-image:url(https://www.muskegon-mi.gov/cresources/dog-beach.jpg)'></div><div class='avia-testimonial-content ' itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/CreativeWork"><p>Love your dog beach, so nice to be able to bring my bestest buddy. Thank you, Thank you! My dog thanks you too!</p>
</div><div class='avia-testimonial-meta'><div class='avia-testimonial-arrow-wrap'><div class='avia-arrow'></div></div><div class='avia-testimonial-meta-mini'><strong class='avia-testimonial-name' itemprop="name">Delta</strong><span class='avia-testimonial-subtitle ' itemprop="jobTitle">Best Friend</span></div></div></div></div>
<div class='avia-testimonial av_one_half flex_column no_margin avia-testimonial-row-1 avia-last-testimonial' itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/Person"><div class='avia-testimonial_inner'><div class='avia-testimonial-image' itemprop="image" style='background-image:url(https://www.muskegon-mi.gov/cresources/segway-tours.jpg)'></div><div class='avia-testimonial-content ' itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/CreativeWork"><p>To be able to see the water, from where you work, is awesome!</p>
</div><div class='avia-testimonial-meta'><div class='avia-testimonial-arrow-wrap'><div class='avia-arrow'></div></div><div class='avia-testimonial-meta-mini'><strong class='avia-testimonial-name' itemprop="name">LaRue Layton</strong><span class='avia-testimonial-subtitle ' itemprop="jobTitle">Owner, Seaway Tours</span></div></div></div></div></section>
<section class='avia-testimonial-row'><div class='avia-testimonial av_one_half flex_column no_margin avia-testimonial-row-2 avia-first-testimonial' itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/Person"><div class='avia-testimonial_inner'><div class='avia-testimonial-image' itemprop="image" style='background-image:url(https://www.muskegon-mi.gov/cresources/thumbs-up.jpg)'></div><div class='avia-testimonial-content ' itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/CreativeWork"><p>I would like to pay kudos to the clerks office! When I called I could hear “Jacqui” smiling over the phone and when I arrived to get my passport, everyone in the office was extremely accommodating. I really appreciate them all! Thank you!</p>
</div><div class='avia-testimonial-meta'><div class='avia-testimonial-arrow-wrap'><div class='avia-arrow'></div></div><div class='avia-testimonial-meta-mini'><strong class='avia-testimonial-name' itemprop="name">Darlene Jenry</strong><span class='avia-testimonial-subtitle ' itemprop="jobTitle">Customer</span></div></div></div></div>
<div class='avia-testimonial av_one_half flex_column no_margin avia-testimonial-row-2 avia-last-testimonial' itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/Person"><div class='avia-testimonial_inner'><div class='avia-testimonial-image' itemprop="image" style='background-image:url(https://www.muskegon-mi.gov/cresources/baking.jpg)'></div><div class='avia-testimonial-content ' itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/CreativeWork"><p>Hello Fabulous Mayor! Congratulations on excellent efforts toward a successful turnaround of a lovely lakefront property! Great energy in Muskegon!</p>
</div><div class='avia-testimonial-meta'><div class='avia-testimonial-arrow-wrap'><div class='avia-arrow'></div></div><div class='avia-testimonial-meta-mini'><strong class='avia-testimonial-name' itemprop="name">Sara</strong><span class='avia-testimonial-subtitle ' itemprop="jobTitle">The Baker’s Wife</span></div></div></div></div></section>
<section class='avia-testimonial-row'><div class='avia-testimonial av_one_half flex_column no_margin avia-testimonial-row-3 avia-first-testimonial' itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/Person"><div class='avia-testimonial_inner'><div class='avia-testimonial-image' itemprop="image" style='background-image:url(https://www.muskegon-mi.gov/cresources/footprints.jpg)'></div><div class='avia-testimonial-content ' itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/CreativeWork"><p>This is my husband and I’s first time here and we are enchanted by the beachy, artsy, summery feel of Muskegon – We love it!</p>
</div><div class='avia-testimonial-meta'><div class='avia-testimonial-arrow-wrap'><div class='avia-arrow'></div></div><div class='avia-testimonial-meta-mini'><strong class='avia-testimonial-name' itemprop="name">Janet Sanchez</strong><span class='avia-testimonial-subtitle ' itemprop="jobTitle">Art Fair Visitor</span></div></div></div></div>
